LoanApplicationFinancial.name: LoanApplicationFinancial
LoanApplicationFinancial.description: Represents transaction details for a loan application.

BorrowerClosingCostAmt.description: Total closing costs due from borrower, including prepaid and initial escrow payments.

CashFromOrToBorrowerAmt.description: Cash the borrower pays or receives at closing, not including reserves or other funds that may still require lender verification.

CounselingAgencyName.description: Counseling provider's name if agency isn't HUD approved or if Housing Counseling Agency ID is unknown

CounselingAgencyProvName.description: Education provider's name if agency isn't HUD-approved or if Housing Counseling Agency ID is unknown.

CounselingComplBorrName.description: Name of borrower or borrowers who completed housing counseling.

CreditFromSeller.description: Total amount of closing costs due from seller.

DiscountPointCostAmount.description: Total cost of discount points purchased by the borrower due at closing.

EdCompletedBorrowerName.description: Name of borrower or borrowers who completed homeownership education.

EstFirstMortgagePmtAmt.description: Proposed monthly first mortgage payment for loan application property, including principal and interest.

EstHomeownersInsPmtAmt.description: Proposed monthly payment for homeowners insurance on application property.

EstMortgageInsPmtAmt.description: Proposed monthly mortgage insurance payment on application property.

EstOtherDuesPaymentAmt.description: Proposed total monthly payment on application property for payments like homeowners association, co-op, condo, or planned unit development dues.

EstOtherPaymentAmt.description: Proposed total monthly payment for other housing expenses on application property.

EstPropertyTaxesPmtAmt.description: Proposed monthly payment for real estate taxes on application property.

EstSubordinateLienPmtAmt.description: Proposed total monthly payment for other mortgages or liens on loan application property, including principal and interest.

EstSuppPropertyInsPmtAmt.description: Proposed monthly payment for supplemental property insurance like flood, earthquake, or umbrella policies on application property.

FinancedMortgageInsAmt.description: Total amount of financed mortgage insurance or financed mortgage insurance equivalent.

FinancialExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

HasCompletedCounseling.description: Indicates whether one or more borrowers completed housing counseling within the last 12 months.

HasHoEducation.description: Indicates whether one or more borrowers completed homeownership education within the last 12 months.

HoEducationFormat.description: Indicates the format of homeownership education attended by borrower.

HousingCounselingFormat.description: Indicates the format of the housing counseling completed by borrower.

HudApprAgencyIdentifier.description: Home counseling provider's Housing Counseling Agency ID if agency is HUD-approved.

HudApprovedProvIdentifier.description: Homeownership education provider's Housing Counseling Agency ID if agency is HUD-approved.

LandAcquiredSeparatelyAmount.description: Price of land if purchased separately from the building or structure.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanAmount.description: Total amount of loan including financed mortgage insurance or mortgage insurance equivalent.

LoanApplicationId.description: ID of the loan application associated with this loan transaction.

LoanExclFinMortInsAmt.description: Loan amount excluding financed mortgage insurance or financed mortgage insurance equivalent.

Name.description: Name of the loan application financial.

OtherCredit.description: Total amount of all purchase credits like borrower credits, credits from third parties, and non-cash seller credits.

OtherNewMortgageLoanAmt.description: Total amount of other new borrower mortgages, both first lien and subordinate lien, on the application property.

OutstandingLoanAmount.description: Total amount of all mortgage loans on application property to be paid off by refinance loan.

RemodelAndRepairsAmount.description: Cost of any alterations, improvements, and repairs on the property.

TotalCashDueFromBorrower.description: Total cash due from borrower at closing.

TotalDebtPaidOffAmount.description: Total amount of all non-application property liabilities borrower indicated would be paid off on or before closing.

TotalEstPaymentAmt.description: Proposed total monthly payment for application property.

TotalMortgageLoanAndCreditAmt.description: Total mortgage loans plus total credits.
